index.title: Coin Packet
index.tryTip: Try sending coin packets to your friends
index.p1: Description: A coin packet with blockchain-based coin within it
index.p3: Send: Enter the coin amount, set a password, and let your friends come grab it.
index.p4: Grab: Enter the correct password to grab (open) your friend's coin packet
index.p5: Tip: The amount you can get in coin packets is random. Everyone has the chance to get the highest amount.
index.shareTip: Get your friends to send you coin packets

send.msg1: The amount is not sufficient to pay the gas fee needed for grabbing packet.
send.msg2: This password has already been used. Please try another.
send.msg5: Please only use Chinese/English characters or numbers
send.msg6: Password must be at least 6 characters long
send.msg8: Please make sure each packets' minimum amount is 0.0001 ETH or more
send.title: Send Coin Packet
send.commandDes: A password is required to open coin packets
send.tip: Coin packets that are not opened within 24 hours will be refunded
send.countDes: Including gas fee needed for grabbing packets

detail.title: Packets Received
detail.des: Coin packet received. Transaction info will be available shortly.
detail.dt: Opened:/(Amount:/ ETH)
detail.btm1: Coin packets that are not opened within 24 hours will be refunded
detail.btm2: Expired and unopened coin packets will be refunded
detail.msg1: No one has opened this coin packet
detail.msg2: Failed to grab packet. The network fee has raised and the remaining network gas is no sufficient

snatch.title: Grab Coin Packets
snatch.msg3: failed password attempts. If you fail more times, you will be prohibited for 5 hours.
snatch.msg4: You have reached the maximum password attempts. Please try again later.

other.downloadCnt: "Coin Packet" is only supported in Dapp Browser. Please download it first.

index.title: 红包发币
index.p1: 别名：区块链上的虚拟货币红包
index.p3: 玩法1：设定口令来发红包给朋友，让他们叫爸爸！
index.p4: 玩法2：输入指定口令来抢红包，抱大腿！
index.p5: 小秘密：拼手气红包，人人都有机会抢到高金额

send.msg1: 您的金额不够付抢红包所需的交易费
send.msg2: 这个口令已经被使用，换一个吧
send.msg5: 只能输入中文，英文和数字
send.msg8: 一个红包最小金额0.0001 ETH
send.title: 发红包
send.commandDes: 抢红包必须输入以上口令
send.tip: 未领取的红包将于24小时后发起退款
send.countDes: 部分将用来支付抢红包交易费

detail.title: 领取详情
detail.des: 已抢到红包，稍等交易建立可在钱包查看
detail.dt: 已领取/个，共/ ETH
detail.btm1: 未领取的红包将于24小时后发起退款
detail.btm2: 过期未被领取的红包将退款
detail.msg2: 无法抢红包。由于交易费上涨，使预留的交易费不足以支付抢红包

snatch.title: 抢红包
snatch.msg3: 输错次，再输错次会禁止输入5小时
snatch.msg4: 口令输错次数超过10次，请稍后再试

other.downloadCnt: “红包发币”只能在Dapp浏览器应用中使用，请先下载

index.title: 紅包發幣
index.p1: 別名：區塊鏈上的虛擬貨幣紅包
index.p3: 玩法1：設定口令來發紅包給朋友
index.p4: 玩法2：輸入指定口令來搶朋友的紅包
index.p5: 小秘密：拼手氣紅包，人人都有機會搶到高金額

send.msg1: 您的金額不夠付搶紅包所需的交易費
send.msg2: 這個口令已經被使用，換一個吧
send.msg5: 只能輸入中文、英文和數字
send.msg8: 一個紅包最小金額0.0001 ETH
send.title: 發紅包
send.commandDes: 搶紅包必須輸入以上口令
send.tip: 未領取的紅包將於24小時後發起退款
send.countDes: 部分將用來支付搶紅包交易費

detail.title: 領取詳情
detail.des: 已搶到紅包，稍等交易建立可在錢包查看
detail.dt: 已領取/個，共/ ETH
detail.btm1: 未領取的紅包將於24小時後發起退款
detail.btm2: 過期未被領取的紅包將退款
detail.msg2: 無法搶紅包。由於交易費上漲，使預留的交易費不足以支付搶紅包

snatch.title: 搶紅包
snatch.msg3: 輸錯次，再輸錯次會禁止輸入5小時
snatch.msg4: 口令輸錯次數超過10次，請稍後再試

other.downloadCnt: “紅包發幣”只能在Dapp瀏覽器app中使用，請先下載
